attributes.action: Test every case of Coronavirus now!
attributes.additional_details:
Lives are at risk and no action is being taken. If the government wants to sit back and watch people die then we have a even bigger problem than the virus .

Where is the compassion, where is the care?

Something must be done to protect the british public.
attributes.background:
Test for every possible case of coronavirus. We need to know who is infected and who is not. This move will help slow the rate of infection and save lives. 

We don’t want to lose our loved ones. Wrote their time. We want to protect them any way we can.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The conduct of tests is a clinical decision for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published a petition calling for the Government to provide publicly accessible testing for coronavirus around the UK, which you might want to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
